A teen-aged girl gets the horse of her dreams and is trained by an ex-Jockey to participate in London's Grand National Steeplechase. In the course of her training, the girl meets a charming aristocrat who offers to fix the race for an exorbitant price. The girl decides to accept the terms in order to finance the horse and her friends lives.
